mapper.sql: carId, teamId, positionId, carNo, simNo, machineNo, type, joinTime, driverName, driverTel, driverAddress, lo, la, status, remark, Extra1, Extra2, Extra3
mapper.insert: insert into tcar (carId, teamId, positionId, carNo, simNo, machineNo, type, joinTime, driverName, driverTel, driverAddress, lo, la, status, remark, Extra1, Extra2, Extra3 ) values (#{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{simno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machineno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jointime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driveraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lo,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{la,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update tcar
teamId = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
positionId = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
carNo = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
simNo = #{simno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machineNo = #{machineno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
joinTime = #{jointime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
driverName = #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driverTel = #{drivertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driverAddress = #{driveraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lo = #{lo,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
la = #{la,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Extra1 = #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Extra2 = #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Extra3 = #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where carId = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tcar set teamId = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, positionId = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carNo = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, simNo = #{simno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machineNo = #{machineno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, joinTime = #{jointime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, driverName = #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driverTel = #{drivertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driverAddress = #{driveraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lo = #{lo,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, la = #{la,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Extra1 = #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Extra2 = #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Extra3 = #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where carId = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT if(isnull(tu.teamId),0,tu.teamId) as TEAMID,tc.carid AS CARID,tc.lo AS LO,tc.la AS LA,tc.driverTel AS PHONE,tc.carno AS CARNO,tc.type AS CARTYPE,tc.machineNo AS MACHINENO, tu.loginTime AS LOGINTIME,tu.userName AS USERNAME FROM tcar AS tc,tuser AS tu WHERE drivertel=#{tel} AND tu.tel=#{tel}

SELECT if(isnull(tu.teamId),0,tu.teamId) as TEAMID,tc.carid AS CARID,tc.lo AS LO,tc.la AS LA,tc.driverTel AS PHONE,tc.carno AS CARNO,tc.type AS CARTYPE,tc.machineNo AS MACHINENO, tu.loginTime AS LOGINTIME,tu.userName AS USERNAME FROM tcar as tc, tuser AS tu where tc.driverTel=tu.tel AND ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN( (tc.lo*PI()/180-#{lo}*PI()/180)/2),2) +COS(tc.lo*PI()/180)*COS(#{lo}*PI()/180)* POW(SIN( (tc.la*PI()/180-#{la}*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000)/1000 <=#{kmNumber}
